name: eODP
description: Comprehensive dataset capturing all offshore drilling sites and holes. Holes at each site are captured as 'section' column types and meters below sea floor (mbsf) are encoded by 't_pos' and 'b_pos' when 'show_position' parameter is included. Project led by Andy Fraass, Leah LeVay, Jocelyn Sessa, and Shanan Peters.
